website_summaries.verdict: This pair of blocks is made from cork rather than EVA, and comes with a strap.
pros: Set includes 2 soft-feel yoga blocks and a 6-foot strap
Available in 5 foam colors or 1 cork option
Designed to resist scratching and ripping
cons: Some users find the strap to be too thin

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: It's nicely wrapped and got home within 48h. The blocks are NOT heavy as someone wrote here. They are nice and firm enough to practice your Pilates / yoga. It doesn't smell anything as others said. Loved! For ideas and more yoga ideas take look on my insta mitiepoca.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Monobe

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for yoga class I teach. These are a good value-I purchased the set of two blocks and strap. The blocks are bigger than others I've purchased (which I prefer) and sturdier. They aren't as 'squishy' which I also like because they last longer when you have a lot of people using them in a classroom setting. Great selection of colors. I've used blocks and straps in my yoga practice/teaching for 20 years, they're wonderful! I'd order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had never used cork blocks so I didn't know what to expect but I was definitely glad I didn't purchase foam blocks. I like that the cork blocks are heavier, don't get nail marks in them, and are solid. Being heavier, they add a good amount of weight for combining flows with strenuous workouts. Being solid, they are especially effective when focusing on adduction and preferred when placing them under my back or neck for shavasana. Cork blocks are definitely my preference.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Plain Cork Blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cork block! (If you want the cork you actually need to select that option when purchasing. This is not a fraudulent company. They give you what you order.) The cork is a bit heavier than the foam options but that is to be expected! I use these blocks regularly in my daily practice, and they are holding up great. They are even attacked often by my robot vacuum, but they still look brand new! I do not use the strap much, as I don’t have the need for one usually. :)
customer_reviews.author: ZebraYogi

customer_reviews.title: So much choice but these are the perfect blocks for me
customer_reviews.text: I've used other people's blocks at yoga class and finally decided to buy my own. There are a lot (understatement) of yoga blocks to choose from on Amazon. I checked the prices, read the reviews, and decided to purchase these. I'm very happy I did. Great quality and good value. The items were very professionally packaged - so nice, I almost didn't want to take the wrap off. These blocks came with a sturdy quality strap. The blocks are very well constructed, and the color just seems to fit the mood at the class. I'm very pleased and would purchase from JBM again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much higher quality than expected after reading reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Didn’t know what to expect. I saw a review that said they were light. That person must never have used the standard foam yoga blocks. These are substantially heavier. And I think that’s a good thing. And another review said the strap was cheap. It’s definitely a nice strap. I was expecting a stiff, rough strap which is definitely cheaper. But this is a nice soft strap that is perfect against the soles of your feet to help with that stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks, bad strap
customer_reviews.text: I dig these blocks. They do exactly what I need. I purchased them for cavitation exercises that my physical therapist recommended and they held up nicely through some serious abuse. Good as any blocks you'll ever find at a yoga studio, and really cheap comparatively. The blocks came with a strap that is basically useless though - It's so weak that it won't hold in place when looped. You can't really use it for anything without doubling it over on itself. But no big deal - the blocks were all I really needed and they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Quality blocks, soft and sturdy strap
customer_reviews.text: The cork blocks are exactly as advertised, and are of similar quality to the ones my yoga studio uses. For at home use I expect them to last a very long time. She strap is quite long, easily adjustable, and is soft (compared to some straps that feel very stiff). I prefer the strap to be soft, but I use it lightly. If you put heavy strain on your straps you might prefer a more heavy duty one. One cork block from most places is upwards of $20, so to get two plus the strap for under $30 is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blocks
customer_reviews.text: These cork blocks are quite nice. I rarely use them in the way the instructions recommend but, I have found other ways of using them. Currently they allow me to do some stretches that I otherwise would be unable to do. The strap is a little lacking. It serves its purpose but would be much nicer if it were thicker. I find it difficult to keep hold of, and it dose not keep its shape. All in all, I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Solid/strong cork blocks, not lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are very solid, which means that they’re not especially light. That’s a positive for me, since I’ve had some problems with light foam blocks slipping in the past, but if you’re carrying your gear a long distance to your studio, it’s something to keep in mind. The strap is not the turquoise color it appeared to be on my monitor; it’s more of a forest green. For my money, I like the sturdiness and environmental sustainability of cork over foam, and I recommend these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: 3u!u

customer_reviews.title: Blocks = good. Straps = average
customer_reviews.text: I like the blocks. Good weight, feel, size. Your mileage may vary. I think the strap could be more robust. The material is thin and folds in on itself, effectively becoming more like a rope than a strap. I got this product because the strap seemed like a bonus, but it's nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: P-Dubb

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice cork yoga blocks. I am not a yogi, so I cannot provide an overall comparison of these blocks to other yoga blocks. But, my layperson opinion is that these are nice yoga blocks, they do what they are expected to do, and I felt like it was far price for two yoga blocks and a yoga (stretching) strap. I would recommend these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are perfect, very sturdy and supportive. Just what I wanted. The strap is fine for a gentle practice, although flimsy. Good value for the money paid, but if you are looking for a long super sturdy strap, this isn’t the strap for you.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I am a yoga novice and use these as I begin a practice. The strap is helpful occasionally but the blocks are very helpful in sitting up and for use with hand placement rather than barely being able to get my hands to the floor. These seem durable and the cork hasn’t flaked at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R. Schuitema

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got these blocks. They are very sturdy. They are not that lightweight because they are 4" thick cork blocks. I noticed that some companies will sell cork blocks at 3" thickness so those are probably lighter. However I wanted 4" for my yoga routine and these are very solid and sturdy. I personally don't mind that the belt is a little flimsy, it sill does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! This set was so perfect and the blocks are so strong and sturdy! I have put my full body weight on each of them ( I weigh about 135 pounds.) and they have held up greatly ! The color was exactly what i was wanting and it came in a cute drawstring bag which fits right into my gym bag! Great purchase for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality blocks and strap
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cork blocks and straps. I had a cheap foam set, but they really weren’t sturdy enough for some poses. My studio had cork ones and so I checked on amazon and here they were. Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: E. Ray

customer_reviews.title: JBM Yoga Blocks and belt are a great product for a terrific price.
customer_reviews.text: JBM Yoga Blocks and Belt are extremely nice, and a great value. I purchased them because I saw a bargain with 2-blocks and a belt for what you normally pay for just 1-block. I was pleasantly surprised These blocks are covered in a nice fabric that stays put. They give a little in certain positions, but not so much that you lose your balance/control, making them a joy to use. it was definitely a win win purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Blocks and strap
customer_reviews.text: I received my products quickly and in good condition. The blocks are good quality and sturdy. I really like the strap, because it is softer than other straps I have used. I like that because I've been doing some stretches using the strap behind my neck.....it is more comfortable than other straps. Also, the strap is very long.
customer_reviews.author: sharon l. thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for awhile now and they work great. The blocks are sturdy and feels high quality. The straps a nice bonus, very long, but I use a different one during my practice that I like the feel of. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Orange Yoga Items are Best
customer_reviews.text: The color is more construction orange than anything. The blocks do the trick. They are study enough for half-moon balance and warrior three, but also good for pyramid and triangle, as well as not too hard for resting your head on during pigeon. I don't often use the strap, but so far, it does what straps are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ansari

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to yoga and glad I chose these as my first blocks. I didn't smell anything gross when opening them as it seems some others did, they were just fine. I haven't used the strap yet but it also seems like good quality. Also love the mint color, it matches my mat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: I really love the blocks
customer_reviews.text: I really love the blocks. The are skid-proof, lightweight and the right size. However, the packaging that included the carrier and strap smelled noxious -- somewhat like ammonia. I threw them away. I'm still perfectly happy with the blocks, though. That's all I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: So far the best yoga blocks I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Like the strap the block on heavy side but it’s not bothering me because I don’t need to commute with them. I actually like them heavy. Let see how long they’re last against the toddler ;)
customer_reviews.author: Zo

customer_reviews.title: Love these yoga blocks!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my weekly yoga class and I love them!! I got the seafoam greenish color with the pink strap and I love the colors!! I get compliments on them all the time. They're also really great for the price 💗
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Blocks is great but the strap is too insubstantial.
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are heavier, which is nice because they feel more substantial. I am not keen on the strap it feels too lightweight compared with other straps I have used. It curls lengthwise far too easily when used. Amended. Blocks are great, the strap is junk, way too light-weight and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Belt
customer_reviews.text: The yoga blocks are fine, although if it gets scratched at all, it looks as it will start to fall apart. The yoga belt is made so cheaply it’s very flimsy! You can’t get a good grip at all. The belt buckle is made super small as well. If you are in need of a yoga belt, save your money and invest in better quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Stew

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like bringing my own blocks and straps to yoga with me, being worried about germs having my own was important to me. I'm new to yoga but have dedicated myself to the practice and this purchase helped me replicate at home what I was learning in my class. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Solid cork blocks with a bonus strap for good measure
customer_reviews.text: Solid cork blocks, the dimensions are pretty standard so if you're within average height this would be a perfect block to use. The strap is a nice bonus but really the blocks are where it's at.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: Probably would consider another product.
customer_reviews.text: Blocks are awesome, the strap is too thin to do its job well. I prefer a more substantial strap for hanging on to without having to wrap around my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packed, two sturdy blocks with the strap. You can use a single block for many exercises. Might have a light smell that will go away after you leave them out for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Super helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m a beginner in yoga and they have been super healthful when stretching and working on my mobility. The only thing that I did not expect was the blocks are heavier than I thought they would be. But that’s not complaint or anything bad. I just thought they would be lighter.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really great! I wish the strap was a little thicker but I've also never used a yoga strap before so I'm not sure how its supposed to be comparatively. The blocks are really pretty and sturdy! I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Michael s

customer_reviews.title: just like what is in the studio I go to
customer_reviews.text: Been forced to do virtual yoga do the pandemic , so grateful for my instructor doing this for me. But, I needed blocks for my home studio and these are perfect. and I think from now on with what is going on the world, I will be taking these with me when classes resume.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a yoga expert, but these two block + strap seem to be of high quality and the price is right. The cork works well against my sweaty, slippery hands.
customer_reviews.author: TrinkyStinks

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% Cork
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are very heavy--not entirely made of cork. Had i known this, I would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Glasgowgrl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Yoga Blocks
customer_reviews.text: Been using these daily for a couple of weeks and they function and yoga blocks should! Good firm foam, no color bleed, no odor. Would buy them again! Though I don’t anticipate needing to anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara P.

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: Good support, but the cork leaves a residue all over my yoga mat and clothing. Ugh. Throwing these out and purchasing a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Katers

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I priced several different blocks. These were competetive AND came with the belt that would have doubled my costs elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Shearman

customer_reviews.title: Get the cork version
customer_reviews.text: The cork version of these are great and the strap that comes with is sturdy. Definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: harmony

customer_reviews.title: Nice blocks not cork
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sturdy blocks. I ordered cork and these are not cork but they are totally acceptable. They work.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Harvell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy support!
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy - therefore not light - blocks. They really make me confident enough to try unknown poses. Big difference!
customer_reviews.author: bhz

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks~
customer_reviews.text: I am SO pleased with the blocks and the strap! I was weary of buying foam blocks, but I'm glad I did; they're still very sturdy but they're easy on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Casserole

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are very sturdy and great quality. Love these way more than the foam blocks used in class. The strap is a good length and soft so not uncomfortable when using in binds or around the feet. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jmatus

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I got exactly what I was hoping for. I wish it wasn't so expensive but I can't argue the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Considering how most yoga studios will try to sell one of these for 60 bucks this is a steal for a pair of them. They are solid cork, and offer great stability but also have a slight give to them, which is perfect. It also comes with a helpful stretch band. I use my blocks every day and am very pleased to get such a great product for such a affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Cute set, blue is true to color
customer_reviews.text: I needed some blocks and a strap to stretch out at home. These match my yoga mat and are just want I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Namaste !
customer_reviews.text: Blocks and strap were amazing. Maybe printing some positions on the block would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Veyna

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy blocks that are thicker than my others. I purchased for my husband who is a beginner in yin yoga. He is 6'2" and the strap was plenty long for him. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyD

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fine; the orange is actually a lot brighter than ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine; the orange is actually a lot brighter than I expected. Not quite safety orange, but close. I would have liked it to be a little darker, but the products work fine, so no worries.
customer_reviews.author: J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and soft at the same time
customer_reviews.text: strong enough to hold my 260lbs off the ground while doing a plank or a push-up/
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them, come hust as expected. Blocks were a but lighter than I expected which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Dani V

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend for the price. These have held up really well :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is what exactly what I was looking for plus there’s a strap which is really nice for stretching the blocks came with a little bit of a smell in like a powder on them but I just wiped them off before I use them
customer_reviews.author: Bita

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and and strap that comes with. Would love to be order to order just more plain straps from this company. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Albert F.

customer_reviews.title: Great combo for any yogi
customer_reviews.text: I liked the value for your money, the blocks are very useful, as well as the strap for yoga practice
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Blocks good, straps useless
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are good. The straps are useless. The strap is flimsy and when threaded through buckle, it slides loose and doesn’t stay in place. Useless for yoga. I hope the seller will provide a refund or better quality straps. 🙏
customer_reviews.author: cameron boyle

customer_reviews.title: No strap
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get a strap in my package. I got two yoga blocks, but no strap. The blocks are lightweight, but they smell weird and I can tell they won’t last me a very long time. You only get what you pay for. $11 yoga blocks are fine, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Marie James

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these yoga blocks for my wife. Our daughter likes to play with the blocks as well. They are very sturdy and comfortable. Would definitely buy them another set. Maybe because my daughter uses them on the floor. I would just recommend keeping the plastic on. They are still easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: misael mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cork blocks with the strap. The cork blocks are a little heavier than foam blocks and seem more durable. They are very nice and it was a good price for the blocks and strap combined.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Lean Machine
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them... actually so do I. Her flexibility has increased immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bruce Jr

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have done yoga for over 5 years. I had never used props until now, but these are great. I sit much straighter when I sit on them and using them for forward fold, down dog and plank is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home yoga practice.
customer_reviews.text: These two blocks and strap are exactly what I needed to continue my yoga practice. These blocks really help me achieve some difficult poses carefully before I fully trust myself to do it on my own. Pretty mint colored blocks and pink strap.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Blocks are great
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are great, which is what I primarily made the purchase for. Very solid, with a good weight so they don’t slide during practice, but not too heavy. The strap is thin and kind of flimsy. It’s really long, which is nice, but I will not be using it as often. Blocks deserve 5 star. Strap... not so great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge help with practice
customer_reviews.text: So far exactly what I need. Strap is handy for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Tallie

customer_reviews.title: Yoga
customer_reviews.text: Hands slip a little when ysing for downward dog. It will scratch and indent.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and the color. The strap is sturdy and also good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Moninger

customer_reviews.title: Newbie yoga
customer_reviews.text: Been using these both since I got them and as a beginner to yoga I have found them extremely helpful and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have been sharing our yoga equipment but , due to the pandemic, I decided I need my own.
customer_reviews.author: imaquilter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy, the blocks are soft and maintain traction. The strap is sturdy. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: No complaints exactly what we needed for a luxury apartments point
customer_reviews.text: No complaints exactly what we needed for a luxury apartments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginner like me. Just started yoga and it was suggested to get a couple of blocks and strap. This is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonBoNannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality, sleek looking, and really come in handy
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The strap is really a very modest: it is very thin. You can't really tell that from the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really good quality! Cork yoga blocks are really hard and kind of heavy, but they're really stable for balance poses.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi White

customer_reviews.title: Great love ordered 4!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sturdy blocks... Compared to my Gaiam blocks, they are heavier and more stable ...highly recommend especially for any pose that requires stability
customer_reviews.author: M. M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I was looking for. The blocks are comfortable and the strap works well. I also think they're pretty so it's nice to have them lying around. The blocks are comfortable, which is important when your weight is on them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect density
customer_reviews.text: Great blocks. Firm enough with a bit of squish. Belt is perfect length for my long legs.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smietana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy blocks, flimsy strap
customer_reviews.text: Great set of blocks. Wish I could get into the home work outs so I could use these blocks more. The strap is flimsy and worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with my new Yoga blocks and strap. Both are very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Shetland

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted to do yoga at home
customer_reviews.text: Love the color blue. Very sturdy belt and the blocks are sturdy but lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Bagpipe Chick

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time despite bad weather. Products as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time despite bad weather. Products as pictured. Love the look of the cork. The yoga strap seems extra long, which is perfect for me. Takes a while to roll up, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter even loves to use yoga blocks and she is 3 😂. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Yoga blocks and strap
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Like that it included a bag for storage and transport. Very good price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent yoga block
customer_reviews.text: I and my yoga students love these blocks. They are very sturdy. I would highly recommend them for home or class use.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D.

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are decent quality, but the strap is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Patton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Blocks are perfect. The strap is less sturdy then hoped for, but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lightweight blocks perfect for yoga practice
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with the blocks and strap. Since we need to be home, these items have made all the difference in my yoga practice. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: d. fratkin

customer_reviews.title: good yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: The Yoga blocks were great,I bought two sets of leg press exercises for my daughter. It played an action that could not be done before, but I felt that the belt seemed to be of little use. In short, I was quite satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality blocks. Heavy, reliable, solid. I also like the strap--it's soft and easy to slide up and down. I like the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiffany Blue Blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Looks just like pictured. Good quality! Color of blocks is a Tiffany Blue!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these blocks to do yoga at home; especially, during my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: adds comfort
customer_reviews.text: Having the blocks and strap makes it easier for me to participate in yoga. Blocks are nice and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: QO

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Very solid yoga blocks with great support and feel. A huge upgrade from the foam variety. Well packaged, delivered quickly. These offer really firm support for chest opening, back bends and inversion movements.
customer_reviews.author: Maddrey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for these blocks because they were so inexpensive but wow! So glad I didn't spend a ton of money. These have a really good, firm feel too them and are very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Better blocks the ones in my yoga studio!
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend buying! Especially if you do yoga at home. They look like they’d last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Mehowa

customer_reviews.title: These are so much better. I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: First time with Yoga and the instructor lent us blocks. These are so much better. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tekflyer

customer_reviews.title: Im in love!
customer_reviews.text: My Yoga Studio provides the foam blocks, way to unstable for me. My instructor suggested these and I love them! Way bigger than the foam, heavier and far more stable!
customer_reviews.author: Misti Holland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. love the strap for stretching and difficult yoga moves based on body size.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I’ve had mine for a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’ve had mine for a few months now, I use them regularly in hot yoga, and they are still just as good as ever. And they don’t stink like the foam/rubbery ones!
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.S.

product_meta.title: JBM Yoga Block Plus Strap with Metal D-Ring Yoga Brick Cork Yoga Block 6 Colors - High Density EVA Foam Yoga Block to Support and Deepen Poses Odor-Resistant
feature_bullets: IMPROVE YOGA STRETCHES: A great aid for both yoga beginners and those who need a little extra help perfecting difficult yoga poses and meditation practices. A versatile and stylish addition to be one of your yoga accessories.

DURABLE QUALITY: Made of soft, non-stick, scratch-proof exterior EVA foam, JBM yoga blocks performs well on any surface - durable but flexible for ultimate effect. Perfect Yoga cushions for all types of yoga workout like Meditation, Bikram / Hot Yoga, Kundalini yoga, Hatha yoga, Ashtanga yoga, Vinyasa yoga, Iyengar yoga, Yin yoga, Power yoga, Restorative yoga.
CLEAN & SAFE: These odor-free yoga blocks are non-absorbent and moisture-proof, keeping you safe from bacteria!
BIG SIZE & LIGHT WEIGHT: 9"W x 6"H x 4"D, large enough to sit on comfortably for meditation practices. Easy-carried and lightweight - each yoga block weighs only 0.38lb.
CONVENIENT 2-PACK PLUS A YOGA STRAP: 2 yoga block plus a yoga strap in one set, giving you unbeatable value! Available in 6 fun colors - purple, sky blue, royal blue, black, orange & green.
